title: Lead UI Artist
content:
As our new Lead UI Artist, you will have experience working on world-class games while leading a team of UI artists. You have a strong understanding of developing a visual identity and the production pipelines involved, with strong hands-on experience around art, technical UI, creation, and system setup.As a discipline lead, you will work closely with the Game Director, Design Director, and Art Director for all UI-related topics. You will work with UI Artists, Programmers, and Designers to implement and create high-quality, adaptable UI. As a Lead UI Artist, you are the topic owner of all topics pertinent to UI, lead the team of UI artists, maintain visual consistency for all UI assets, and help to define the UI pipeline.
This new position is due to growth. You would work alongside our current Lead UI Artist to help create two teams, one for each project. 
Responsibilities: 

Lead a team of UI Artists and be accountable for all UI-related topics.
Build world-class functional UI working closely with game designers, UI Artists and Programmers.
Implement UI widgets and systems in Unreal Engine UMG UI Designer.
Ensure UI correctly adapts to various screen shapes and resolutions with appropriate anchoring and scaling.
Work with existing and new wireframes for review and approval.
Work with UI programmers to implement and optimise runtime UI.
Work with UI artists and designers to realise and polish player experiences.
Document UI/UX pipelines and workflows.

Requirements: 

5+ years professional experience working in a similar capacity within the games or other relevant creative industry.
Experience in leading a UI team.
In-depth knowledge of UI and UX principles.
Familiar with UI software architecture patterns (e.g. MVVM).
Hands on experience with Unreal Engine UMG UI Designer or other game UI systems (Unity UI etc).
Familiar with Source Control software, preferably Perforce.
Working knowledge of wireframing tools and digital content creation tools used for UI.
Strong communication skills with the capability to successfully work across multiple teams.
Strong English skills, both written and verbal.
